author: sjur
msg: Added an exslt directory + Readme file, cf https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/FOR-1176.

author: gbrown
msg: Ensure that Dialog, MenuPopup, and Sheet correctly report the closing state of the base class after their own close events have been approved.

author: jbellis
msg: add contrib/bmt_example/CassandraBulkLoader.java.  Patch by Chris Goffinet; reviewed by jbellis for CASSSANDRA-398

author: gbrown
msg: Track independent closing state in MenuPopup, Dialog, and Sheet. Otherwise, instances of these classes may prevent their owners from closing, since they will never appear to be closing themselves.

author: jbellis
msg: Always generate sstable generation numbers by atomic increment instead of leaving 'holes' that compaction uses.  Sometimes, bucketing is not perfect and the holes method will overwrite one of the being-compacted files.  Since #223 it has not been important to keep compacted files lower in generation number than newly created ones so this is both simpler and more correct.  Patch by Sammy Yu; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-418
